name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in full-stack development, leveraging expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Next.js** to deliver high-performance applications. Proficient in implementing **CI/CD** practices, ensuring adherence to software development standards and code quality. Adept at deploying scalable solutions on **AWS**, fostering collaborative communication and product architecture design.
Demonstrated ability in integrating advanced technologies within healthcare and financial sectors, specializing in AI/ML platforms that facilitate predictive analytics and real-time processing. Versatile skill set includes frontend and backend development with frameworks such as **Flutter**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, and backend technologies like **FastAPI** and **Django**. Strong focus on compliance-driven solutions, aligning with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, complemented by a solid foundation in MLOps using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
